short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'View Image' button back to Google Image search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps by implementing the Google Images' "View Image" button. Adds a 'View Image' button back to let users view the image in a new chrome tab.

It restores the "View Image" button to Google Image Search™ results again. When you select an image, you may choose to download or view the image. These additional buttons will appear next to the usual buttons.

 

Google Search is a trademark of Google Inc. The use of the trademark is subject to Google’s permission. This extension is neither endorsed by or affiliated with Google.
